name: Nora
info:
• 简体中文名: 诺拉
  • 性别: 女
  • 引用来源: https://thelastofus.fandom.com/wiki/Nora
detail: Nora is a character who appears in The Last of Us Part II. She joined the Washington Liberation Front at some point. Stationed in Seattle, she encounters Ellie, who holds her a gunpoint. The pair had met prior to this incident.

jobs.name: The Last of Us: Part II
